mapper.select: SELECT r.*, ( SELECT s.STORE_NAME FROM STORE s WHERE s.STORE_ID = r.STORE_ID ) AS STORE_NAME FROM ( SELECT RESERV_ID, STORE_ID, USER_ID, RESERV_DATE, RESERV_HOUR, RESERV_MIN, RESERV_PERSONNEL, RESERV_DATE_CREATED, CANCEL_STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESERV_DATE ASC) AS RN FROM RESERV WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERV_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) r WHERE r.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT r.*, ( SELECT s.STORE_NAME FROM STORE s WHERE s.STORE_ID = r.STORE_ID ) AS STORE_NAME FROM ( SELECT RESERV_ID, STORE_ID, USER_ID, RESERV_DATE, RESERV_HOUR, RESERV_MIN, RESERV_PERSONNEL, RESERV_DATE_CREATED, CANCEL_STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESERV_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM RESERV WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERV_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CANCEL_STATUS = 0 ) r WHERE r.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT r.*, ( SELECT s.STORE_NAME FROM STORE s WHERE s.STORE_ID = r.STORE_ID ) AS STORE_NAME FROM ( SELECT RESERV_ID, STORE_ID, USER_ID, RESERV_DATE, RESERV_HOUR, RESERV_MIN, RESERV_PERSONNEL, RESERV_DATE_CREATED, CANEL_STATUS, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESERV_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM RESERV WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND CANCEL_STATUS = 1 ) r WHERE r.RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERV WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERV_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERV WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERV_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CANCEL_STATUS = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERV R INNER JOIN RESERV_CANCEL C ON R.RESERV_ID = C.RESERV_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT r.*, s.STORE_NAME, s.STORE_PHONE, a.ROAD_ADDRESS, a.JIBUN_ADDRESS, a.DETAIL_ADDRESS FROM RESERV r INNER JOIN STORE s ON r.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID INNER JOIN STORE_ADDRESS a ON r.STORE_ID = a.STORE_ID WHERE r.RESERV_ID = #{reservId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERV VALUES( RESERV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{storeId}, #{userId}, #{reservDate}, #{reservHour}, #{reservMin}, #{reservPersonnel}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, C.CANCEL_ID, C.CANCEL_COMMENT, C.REQUEST_STATUS, U.NAME, U.PHONE FROM RESERV R INNER JOIN RESERV_CANCEL C ON R.RESERV_ID = C.RESERV_ID INNER JOIN USER_MEMBER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND CANCEL_STATUS = #{cancelStatus}
